Elsewhere on the web:

Lucas David-Roesler

I am a recent graduate from the University of Connecticut where I completed my Ph.D. studing combinatorics, tilting theory, and cluster algebras with Ralf Schiffler.

You can find a brief guide to my research here. For all of the gory details, you can find all of my mathematical papers on the arxiv.

You can find my coding projects on either Github or Bitbucket.

For my recent history you can check out my Resume
